price: Báyẹn náà ni wọ́n ṣe ń ṣẹ́ àwọn tó ń tako àwọn āyah Allāhu lórí kúrò níbi òdodo (ṣíwájú tiwọn).
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
